mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (iuser, address, total_price, shipping_price, shipping_memo) VALUES (#{iuser}, #{address}, #{totalPrice}, #{shippingPrice}, #{shippingMemo})

INSERT INTO `order_item` (iorder, iitem, price, quantity, total_price) VALUES
(#{item.iorder}, #{item.iitem}, (SELECT price FROM item WHERE iitem=#{item.iitem}), #{item.quantity}, #{item.totalPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT B.iitem, B.name, A.price, A.quantity, A.total_price totalPrice, B.pic FROM order_item A INNER JOIN item B ON A.iitem = B.iitem WHERE iorder = #{iorder}
SELECT A.iitem, B.name, B.price, A.quantity, B.pic FROM cart A INNER JOIN item B ON A.iitem = B.iitem WHERE iuser = #{iuser} AND A.check = 1
